# Bug Reporting Website - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
A Next.js bug reporting website for employees to submit and track bugs.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- React 18+
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS

## Project Structure
- `src/app/` - Next.js App Router pages
- `src/components/` - React components
- `src/types/` - TypeScript type definitions
- `src/lib/` - Utility functions and helpers

## Development Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run start` - Start production server
- `npm run lint` - Run ESLint

## Features
- Bug submission form with title, description, severity, priority
- Bug list view with filtering
- Status tracking (Open, In Progress, Resolved, Closed)
- Modern responsive UI with Tailwind CSS
